RelatedSentence: Rolls - Royce won a $ 31.9 m contract to deliver deck machinery for four ocean going tugs , designed by Ulstein Design & Solutions , for Dutch company ALP Maritime Services .
Rolls - Royce won a $ 31.9 m contract to deliver deck machinery for four ocean going tugs , designed by Ulstein Design & Solutions , for Dutch company ALP Maritime Services .
The vessels will be constructed in Japan by Niigata Shipbuilding & Repair .
